column5: Anybody know who sells these things locally in the GTA area? Would be great for all my trolling spoons as I am getting way too many plastic trays of them.
oh oh...  Wayne's got the trolling bug now...  they usually have the spoon boxes at the fishing show... might wanna try there
Had it for a few years Goran... just getting too big a collection of plastic trays....
I know where to get Special Mate boxes. Does it have to be the Maxi-Mate?  If these are okay, I can pick one up for you. -Brian
They look the same Brian, thanks. I'm in no rush... got my eye on 126 spoons in a FREE    box first... and then I'll need another for what I've already got ! LOL
Wayne, I'll be driving by Angling Outfitters tommorrow and will stop in and check there for you.
gagnon sports in oshawa has them, may not be maxi mate but they got those big boxes for those musky plugs/spoons etc. they were $69.99 pretty heavy duty too!!
can be ordered from the Lake Michigan Angler site, but yes Jos should be able to get 'em in for you - there is the regular spoon sized box & the magnum.

Wayne......Gagnon's does have them but a very poor selection and quantity of. QuinteOutdoors Sports has them for sure in quantity and selection. I believe their web site to be just that: QuinteOutdoorSports.com or similar. They may have a mail order system in tact, not sure of that. Pete
Wayne you could make your own, this is all you need.
Thanks for linking up everyone with what I'm bidding on drwxr!
Try JBs  I purchased mine there and it holds about 200 spoons.   A nice box and Brian gave me a great price.  Bill
Thanks Bill... need a trip to see Brian before spring anyhow. I'll let Leah hold my wallet while I go inside! LOL
Wanye....give me 10 bucks cash and I'll stop outbidding you on ebay...... hehe.
